item.title: EVs, AI, Consolidation Dominate Dealer Strategies For Future Survival
item.description: Executives of Asbury Automotive Group and the Dave Cantin Group talk difficulties of selling EVs, new uses for AI tools and dealership consolidation.

item.title: The ACIP Is Set To Meet This Week. Here’s What’s At Stake For Public Health
item.description: The ACIP will meet September 18-19, and their decisions could significantly shape the public health infrastructure for vaccine availabilty.
